title: Pitcher
marks: Signature, Inscription and Stamp on bottom, in black: [EDITION/ PICASSO/ MADOURA]
description: jug with ring base; rounded bottom with long, outward-tapering neck; long, thick handle; white body; black, white, blue and brown; decorated to resemble an owl
creditline: Gift of Kenneth and Margery Carpenter
